Pre-Game Insights: The New Orleans Pelicans (6-29) are favored (by 3.5 points) to break a 15-game road losing streak when they visit the Washington Wizards (6-26) on Sunday, January 5, 2025 at 6:00 PM ET.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Wizards have an ATS record of 13-19 as 3.5-point underdogs or greater.
The Wizards have played 13 games this season that finished with a combined score higher than 235.5 points.
Others: The Pelicans have entered the game as favorites eight times this season and won three of those games.
This season, Washington has come away with a win five times in 31 chances when named as an underdog of at least +145 or worse on the moneyline.
